name: .PFT File Extension
summary: Learn about .PFT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: If you still have access to ChiWriter (MS-DOS), you can open and edit your PFT file in the program's font editor. If you do not have access to ChiWriter, you may be able to use the Linux program Dosbox to run the version of ChiWriter linked below.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
